description: Database Searcher is like Google for your SQL Server database. It will search all columns for all tables over multiple databases. It will return a summary of matches, the generated SQL and the detailed matches per table. It will also search the schema by the table names or column names. Knowledge of SQL queries is not required. This is a 30 day trial that can be licensed and managed with Chocolatey.
summary: Database Searcher searches the data and schema accross multiple SQL Server Databases
author: KellermanSoftware
